column1: aExpression trends for the targets below are plotted in Figures 1 and 2 of the text.
bClusters 1-10 contain genes negatively-regulated by CodY, clusters 11-14 contain genes positively-regulated by CodY.

cIDAP indicates whether genes and operons are direct or indirect targets of CodY as determined by in vitro DNA affinity purification coupled to sequencing (Belitsky and Sonenshein, 2013).  Genes in parentheses are the presumed first genes of operons to which a given gene has been assigned.
